channel.title: Cake on Cooking
channel.description: Recent content in Cake on Cooking

item.title: Banana Muffins with Chocolate
item.description: ⏲️ Prep time: 15 min 🍳 Cook time: 30 min Ingredients 3 bananas 100 g / ½ cups butter 150 g / ¾ cups sugar 2 eggs 1½ tsp. cooking powder 260 g / 2⅛ cups wheat flour 50 g / 1¾ oz dark chocolate 50 g / 1¾ oz milk chocolate some vanilla sugar (optional) Directions Peel the bananas and mush them together. Whip the two eggs and mix them with the sugar.

item.title: Scandinavian Coffee Cake
item.description: ⏲️ Prep time: 15 min 🍳 Cook time: ≈ 3 hours 🍽️ Servings: 1 cake Ingredients 1/2 cup milk 1/2 cup shortening 1/2 cup sugar 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 package active dry yeast 1/4 cup warm (not hot) water 3 cup sifted enriched Flour 2 eggs, beaten melted butter, or margarine 2/3 cup firmly packed brown sugar 2 teaspoon cinnamon chopped walnuts Directions Scald milk. Add shortening, sugar, and salt.
